name.baseName: Remediated soil ; Solidification and stabilization ; In situ replacement ; Mixing and backfilling after excavation ; 3:1 paper ash
修复后土壤;固化稳定化;原地异位;开挖后混合再回填;3:1 纸灰

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Solidification/stabilization is a technology that mixes contaminated soil with binders that can aggregate into solids, thereby capturing or fixing pollutants in solid structures.
固化/稳定化是将污染土壤与能聚结成固体的黏结剂混合，从而将污染物捕获或固定在固体结构中的技术。

quantitativeReference.functionalUnitOrOther: The functional unit was the management of 1.0 m3 of contaminated soil at the Old Zinc-Works site. A time horizon of 100 years was assumed.

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: This study refers to the reclamation activities that were per formed at the Old Zinc-Works site in the town of Celje (in eastern Slovenia).
本研究涉及在Celje镇（斯洛文尼亚东部）的旧锌厂现场进行的修复活动。

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: The excavated soil was sieved by a mobile screener to a gradation of less than 16 mm. A temporary depot was constructed on site from horizontal layers of the prepared material. This material was then moved from the depot by means of an excavator, in such a way that it scooped up the prepared material perpendicular to the layers. In this way, the greatest possible homogeneity of the contaminated soil was achieved. Paper ash, which was used as an additive. The soil and the additive were mixed together in a dry mass ratio of 3:1 in the mobile mixing plant, followed by adding water in order to reach an optimal water content (22 ± 2 wt %). The produced composite was spread over the excavation area in layers, each having a thickness of 30 cm. These layers were separately compacted by means of a heavy roller up to 98% of the reference dry density. The procedure was repeated until a fill had been constructed (average thickness of approximately 3 m), in which the contaminants were immobilized by means of physical and chemical mechanisms. Finally, a layer of waste rock was spread on top of the fill to a thickness of 0.9 m using a bulldozer, in order to ensure sufficient resistance of the composite to freezing/thawing conditions. A heavy roller was then used to compact this layer.

用移动筛将挖出的土壤筛至小于16mm的级配。在现场用制备材料的水平层建造一个临时仓库。然后通过挖掘机将这些材料从仓库中移出，使其垂直于各层挖出制备好的材料。通过这种方式，获得了受污染土壤的最大可能均匀性。用作添加剂的纸灰。土壤和添加剂在移动式搅拌站中以3:1的干质量比混合在一起，然后加水以达到最佳含水量（22±2 wt%）。将生产的复合材料分层摊铺在开挖区域上，每层厚度为30cm。这些层通过重型压路机分别压实，压实密度高达参考干密度的98%。重复该程序，直到构建了填充物（平均厚度约3m），其中通过物理和化学机制固定污染物。最后，使用推土机将一层废石摊铺在填料顶部，厚度为0.9m，以确保复合材料对冻融条件具有足够的抵抗力。然后使用重型滚筒压实该层。
technology.technologicalApplicability: The remediation process of the Old Zinc-Works site in Celje, Slovenia, employs soil solidification and stabilization to manage the contaminated land onsite. The technique involves mixing contaminated soil with paper ash as a binder in a 3:1 dry mass ratio and compacting the mixed material onsite to rehabilitate the area for future use. This method is applicable to industrial site reclamation where the contaminated soil needs to be treated in place or where off-site treatment is not feasible.
斯洛文尼亚Celje镇旧锌厂场地的修复过程采用土壤固化和稳定技术来处理现场污染土地。该技术涉及将污染土壤与纸灰作为粘结剂按3:1干质量比混合，并在现场对混合材料进行压实，以重新利用该地区进行未来用途。这种方法适用于需要就地处理污染土壤的工业场地的修复，或者非现场处理不可行的场合。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Pranjić M A ,Oprčkal P ,Mladenovič A , et al. Comparative Life Cycle Assessment of possible methods for the treatment of contaminated soil at an environmentally degraded site. Journal of Environmental Management, 2018, 218 497-508.

Pranjić M A ,Oprčkal P ,Mladenovič A , et al. Comparative Life Cycle Assessment of possible methods for the treatment of contaminated soil at an environmentally degraded site. Journal of Environmental Management, 2018, 218 497-508.

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When using this data set, it is crucial to apply it to similar contexts of industrial site remediation where in situ soil solidification and stabilization are performed. Ensure alignment with the functional unit of managing 1.0 m3 of contaminated soil on a 100-year time horizon. This protocol is designed for scenarios where the distance between the excavation/installation location and the remediation process is negligible. Users should consider regional differences, such as climate conditions that affect the freeze/thaw resistance of the stabilized soil, and adjust the use of materials and methods accordingly.
使用此数据集时，确保将其应用于执行现场土壤固化和稳定化的工业场地修复的相似情况。请确保与管理1.0 m3污染土壤并假设100年时间范围的功能单位对齐。该协议适用于挖掘/安装位置和修复过程之间距离可以忽略的情景。用户应考虑区域差异，例如影响稳定土壤冻融抵抗的气候条件，并相应调整材料和方法的使用。

completeness.common:other: The distances between the excavation/installation site, the temporary depot, and the location of the remediation process were negligible.
修复区域、临时仓库和修复过程位置之间的距离可以忽略不计。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: Remediation process (production of the geotechnical composite)
Remediation process (production of the geotechnical composite)
Covering material for thermal protection against freezing/thawing effects
Pre-treatment of the soil and production of the geotechnical composite
Placing of the composite at the excavation site
Delivery of covering material (waste rock) (35 km)
Spreading and compacting of the covering material (top layer)
